00196  static bool IsCompressionSupported(WORD uCompressionMethod)
00197  {  
00198   return uCompressionMethod == methodStore || uCompressionMethod == methodDeflate
00199    ;
00200  }

00236  virtual void InitCompression(int iLevel, CZipFileHeader* pFile, CZipCryptograph* pCryptograph) 
00237  {
00238   InitBuffer();
00239   m_uComprLeft = 0;

00258  virtual void InitDecompression(CZipFileHeader* pFile, CZipCryptograph* pCryptograph)
00259  {
00260   InitBuffer();
00261   m_pFile = pFile;
00262   m_pCryptograph = pCryptograph;
00263 
00264   m_uComprLeft = m_pFile->GetDataSize(true);
00265   m_uUncomprLeft = m_pFile->m_uUncomprSize;
00266   m_uCrc32 = 0;
00267  }

00418  void FlushWriteBuffer()
00419  {
00420   WriteBuffer(m_pBuffer, (DWORD)m_uComprLeft);
00421   m_uComprLeft = 0;
00422  }
00423 
00433  void WriteBuffer(char* pBuffer, DWORD uSize)
00434  {
00435   if (uSize == 0)
00436    return;
00437   if (m_pCryptograph)
00438    m_pCryptograph->Encode(pBuffer, uSize);
00439   m_pStorage->Write(pBuffer, uSize, false);  
00440  }
00441 
00448  DWORD FillBuffer()
00449  {
00450   DWORD uToRead = m_pBuffer.GetSize();
00451   if (m_uComprLeft < uToRead)
00452    uToRead = (DWORD)m_uComprLeft;
00453   
00454   if (uToRead > 0)
00455   {
00456    m_pStorage->Read(m_pBuffer, uToRead, false);
00457    if (m_pCryptograph)
00458     m_pCryptograph->Decode(m_pBuffer, uToRead);
00459    m_uComprLeft -= uToRead;
00460   }
00461   return uToRead;
00462  }
00463 
00470  void InitBuffer();
00471 
00478  void ReleaseBuffer()
00479  {
00480   m_pBuffer.Release();
00481  }
00482 
00492  virtual int ConvertInternalError(int iErr) const
00493  {
00494   return iErr;
00495  }
00496 
00510  void ThrowError(int iErr, bool bInternal = false)
00511  {
00512   if (bInternal)
00513    iErr = ConvertInternalError(iErr);
00514   CZipException::Throw(iErr, m_pStorage->IsClosed(true) ? _T("") : (LPCTSTR)m_pStorage->m_pFile->GetFilePath());
00515  }
